# llms.txt - Information about maximillianfer.dev

Maximillian Fernandez Portfolio Website
https://maximillianfer.dev

## About
This is the personal portfolio website of Maximillian Fernandez, a Senior Software Engineer and Frontend Architect with 10+ years of experience specializing in Next.js, React, TypeScript, AI Engineering, and UX/UI design.

## Content
- Personal portfolio showcasing projects, experience, and skills
- Technical blog articles about web development, accessibility, AI integration, and software architecture
- Bilingual content (English and Spanish)
- Projects include Humancore AI, Laika Mascotas, and IKATECH Solutions

## Structure
- Homepage: Main portfolio with hero section, skills, experience, projects, and blog
- Blog posts: Technical articles accessible via /blog/:slug routes
- Projects: Showcase of major work with descriptions and links

## Technologies
Built with React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and React Router.

## Contact
Email: maximillianf22@gmail.com
Location: Barranquilla, Colombia
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/maximillian548870154/
GitHub: https://github.com/maximillianf22
